summary: I am frequently asked to blurb upcoming books and I do try to read and (when appropriate) offer up those endorsements.  But doing so does take time and thought, and looking at my schedule between now and the end of the year — which includes writing a novel, three book tours, five convention/festival appearances, three […]
title: On Blurb Hiatus Through the End of 2024
